commits.message:
EUCA-11069 - Elastic IP assocation lost when CLC is restart.

Description: Upon restart of the CLC the assignments of all EIP (except for system addresses) will get put into the allocated state.

Changes: Added a parameter to the update function to pass the mode (EDGE or VPCMIDO). This fix only addresses EDGE mode. On network
         updates the Address will be assigned to the instance if not already assigned.

Testing: Restarted CLC, ensured that the Address gets assigned to the Instance correctly. Manually unassigned the address,
         Within seconds the Address is assigned back to the instance.
